metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

integration.name: AWS Lambda
integration.description: The AWS Lambda plugin deploys OCI images as functions to AWS Lambda.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

activeRelease.readme:
The AWS Lambda plugin deploys OCI images as functions to [AWS Lambda](https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/getting-started/).

### Components

1. [Platform](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-lambda/latest/components/platform/aws-lambda-platform)

### Related Plugins

1. [Docker](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/docker)
2. [AWS ECR](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ecr)
3. [AWS Lambda Function URL](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/lambda-function-url)

<!--This plugin does not implement the resource manager framework, so the
"Resources" section is omitted-->

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Deploy functions as OCI Images to AWS Lambda.

### Interface

- Input: **ecr.Image**
- Output: **lambda.Deployment**

### Examples

```hcl
deploy {
	use "aws-lambda" {
		region = "us-east-1"
		memory = 512
	}
}
```
components.name: AWS Lambda Platform

variables.description: The instruction set architecture that the function supports. Valid values are: "x86_64", "arm64"
an IAM Role specified by ARN that will be used by the Lambda at execution time
the amount of memory, in megabytes, to assign the function
the AWS region for the ECS cluster

environment variables to expose to the lambda function
environment variables that are meant to configure the application in a static way. This might be to control an image that has multiple modes of operation, selected via environment variable. Most configuration should use the waypoint config commands.
The storage size (in MB) of the Lambda function's `/tmp` directory. Must be a value between 512 and 10240.
the number of seconds a function has to return a result
